When aspiring knight Gareth goes in search of a fallen comet rumored to contain
gold, he is shocked to instead find the dragon Drago. After Drago saves Gareth's
life the two become intricately bonded, and must work together to defeat an evil
sorcerer and stop his reign of terror. Along the way, Gareth learns the true
meaning of being a knight in this fantasy action-adventure for the ages.
